rules_text:
When Leyseeker enters, [b][draw X cards][/b], where X is the number of colors among monocolored permanents you control. When you do, discard that many cards.
Impetus {X}{X}{U} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard as a sorcery with only the text in square brackets for {X}{X}{U}. Then exile it.)[/i]
